history.proof: unfold commute. intros x y z H1 H2. shelve.

ctx: intros x y z H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment X : Set S, TX : relation X HS : local_commute TX S Hwf : well_founded (trans (comp (plus S) (plus TX))) x, y, z : X H1 : star TX x y H2 : star S x z Unable to unify "local_commute TX S" with "exists2 y' : X, star TX z y' & star S y y'".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
X: Set
TX: relation X
S: relation X
HS: local_commute TX S
Hwf: well_founded (trans (comp (plus S) (plus TX)))

Goal:
commute TX S

Premises:
comp : forall X Y Z : Type, relation2 X Y -> relation2 Y Z -> relation2 X Z
well_founded : forall A : Type, (A -> A -> Prop) -> Prop
relation = fun X : Type => relation2 X X : Type -> Type Arguments relation _%type_scope
local_commute : forall X : Type, relation X -> relation X -> Prop
plus : forall X : Type, relation X -> relation X
commute : forall X : Type, relation X -> relation X -> Prop
trans : forall X Y : Type, relation2 X Y -> relation2 Y X
ssrbool.onPhantom : forall (P : ?T -> Prop) (x : ?T), ssreflect.phantom Prop (P x) where ?T : [X : Set S : relation X TX : relation X HS : local_commute TX S Hwf : well_founded (trans (comp (plus S) (plus TX))) |- Type]
diagram_plus_wf_1 : forall (X : Set) (S TX : relation X), diagram TX S (star TX) (plus S) -> well_founded (trans S) -> forall TX' : relation X, diagram TX' S (comp (star TX) TX') (plus S) -> strong_commute (comp (star TX) TX') (plus S)
diagram_plus_wf : forall (X : Set) (S TX : relation X), diagram TX S (star TX) (plus S) -> well_founded (trans S) -> diagram (star TX) (plus S) (star TX) (plus S)
diagram_plus_wf_2 : forall (X : Set) (S TX : relation X), diagram TX S (star TX) (plus S) -> well_founded (trans S) -> forall TX' : relation X, diagram TX' S (comp (star TX) TX') (plus S) -> forall (Y : Type) (R R' : relation2 X Y) (TY TY' : relation Y), diagram TX R (star TY) (comp (star S) R) -> diagram TX' R (comp (star TY) TY') (comp (star S) R') -> diagram (comp (star TX) TX') (comp (star S) R) (comp (star TY) TY') (comp (star S) R')
plus_wf : forall (X : Set) (R : relation X), well_founded (trans R) -> well_founded (trans (plus R))
diagram_star_wf_1 : forall (Y : Type) (R : relation2 X Y) (TY : relation Y), diagram TX R (star TY) (comp (star S) R) -> diagram (star TX) (comp (star S) R) (star TY) (comp (star S) R)
inv_plus : forall (X : Type) (T : relation X), eeq (trans (plus T)) (plus (trans T))
diagram_plus : forall (X X' : Type) (RX : relation2 X X') (R : relation X) (S : relation X'), diagram RX R RX (plus S) -> diagram RX (plus R) RX (plus S)
comp_plus_star : forall (X : Type) (T : relation X), eeq (comp (plus T) (star T)) (plus T)
comp_star_plus : forall (X : Type) (T : relation X), eeq (comp (star T) (plus T)) (plus T)
Acc_clos_trans : forall (X : Set) (R : relation X) (x : X), Acc (trans R) x -> Acc (trans (plus R)) x
diagram_star_wf_2 : forall (Y : Type) (R : relation2 X Y) (TY : relation Y), diagram TX R (star TY) (comp (star S) R) -> forall (X' Y' : Type) (TaX : relation2 X X') (TaY : relation2 Y Y') (S' : relation2 X' X') (R' : relation2 X' Y'), diagram TaX S (comp (star TX) TaX) (star S') -> diagram TaX R (comp (star TY) TaY) (comp (star S') R') -> diagram (comp (star TX) TaX) (comp (star S) R) (comp (star TY) TaY) (comp (star S') R')
inv_comp : forall (X Y Z : Type) (R : relation2 X Y) (S : relation2 Y Z), eeq (trans (comp R S)) (comp (trans S) (trans R))
plus_incl : forall (X : Type) (T' T : relation X), incl T T' -> incl (plus T) (plus T')
plus_eeq : forall (X : Type) (T' T : relation X), eeq T T' -> eeq (plus T) (plus T')
comp_assoc : forall (X Y Z : Type) (R : relation2 X Y) (S : relation2 Y Z) (W : Type) (U : relation2 Z W), eeq (comp (comp R S) U) (comp R (comp S U))
inv_inv : forall (X : Type) (T : relation X), eeq (trans (trans T)) T
inv_star : forall (X : Type) (T : relation X), eeq (trans (star T)) (star (trans T))
comp_eeq : forall (X Y Z : Type) (R' : relation2 X Y) (S' : relation2 Y Z) (R : relation2 X Y) (S : relation2 Y Z), eeq R R' -> eeq S S' -> eeq (comp R S) (comp R' S')
comp_incl : forall (X Y Z : Type) (R' : relation2 X Y) (S' : relation2 Y Z) (R : relation2 X Y) (S : relation2 Y Z), incl R R' -> incl S S' -> incl (comp R S) (comp R' S')
diagram_star : forall (X X' : Type) (RX : relation2 X X') (R : relation X) (S : relation X'), diagram RX R RX (star S) -> diagram RX (star R) RX (star S)
comp_star_star : forall (X : Type) (T : relation X), eeq (comp (star T) (star T)) (star T)
inv_union2 : forall (X Y : Type) (R R' : relation2 X Y), eeq (trans (union2 R R')) (union2 (trans R) (trans R'))
trans_incl : forall (X Y : Type) (R' R : relation2 X Y), incl R R' -> incl (trans R) (trans R')
trans_eeq : forall (X Y : Type) (R' R : relation2 X Y), eeq R R' -> eeq (trans R) (trans R')
Wf_nat.lt_wf = Wf_nat.well_founded_ltof nat (fun m : nat => m) : well_founded lt
Wf_nat.well_founded_ltof : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat), well_founded (Wf_nat.ltof A f)
Wf_nat.well_founded_gtof : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat), well_founded (Wf_nat.gtof A f)
Wf_nat.well_founded_inv_rel_inv_lt_rel : forall (A : Set) (F : A -> nat -> Prop), well_founded (Wf_nat.inv_lt_rel A F)
diagram_comp : forall (X Y Z X' Y' Z' : Type) (RY : relation2 Y Y') (RX : relation2 X X') (R1 : relation2 X Y) (R2 : relation2 Y Z) (RZ : relation2 Z Z') (S1 : relation2 X' Y') (S2 : relation2 Y' Z'), diagram RX R1 RY S1 -> diagram RY R2 RZ S2 -> diagram RX (comp R1 R2) RZ (comp S1 S2)
PeanoNat.Nat.gt_wf : forall z : nat, well_founded (fun n m : nat => m < n <= z)
PeanoNat.Nat.lt_wf : forall z : nat, well_founded (fun n m : nat => z <= n < m)
inv_union : forall (I X Y : Type) (F : I -> relation2 X Y), eeq (trans (union F)) (union (fun i : I => trans (F i)))
BinInt.Z.gt_wf : forall z : BinNums.Z, well_founded (fun n m : BinNums.Z => BinInt.Z.lt m n /\ BinInt.Z.le n z)
BinNat.N.lt_wf : forall z : BinNums.N, well_founded (fun n m : BinNums.N => BinNat.N.le z n /\ BinNat.N.lt n m)
BinInt.Z.lt_wf : forall z : BinNums.Z, well_founded (fun n m : BinNums.Z => BinInt.Z.le z n /\ BinInt.Z.lt n m)
BinNat.N.gt_wf : forall z : BinNums.N, well_founded (fun n m : BinNums.N => BinNat.N.lt m n /\ BinNat.N.le n z)
strong_commute : forall X : Type, relation X -> relation X -> Prop
semi_commute : forall X : Type, relation X -> relation X -> Prop
Wf_nat.well_founded_lt_compat : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (R : A -> A -> Prop), (forall x y : A, R x y -> f x < f y) -> well_founded R

intros.
unfold commute. intros x y z H1 H2.
apply HS.
apply (Hwf _ _ _ H2 H1).

original: intros. unfold commute. intros x y z H1 H2. apply HS. apply (Hwf _ _ _ H2 H1).
